data.title: Tucson Electric Power – TEP provides safe and reliable power to Tucson residents. We offer customers a wide range of incentivized programs to help reduce energy costs and build a better future.
data.meta_description: TEP provides safe and reliable power to Tucson residents. We offer customers a wide range of incentivized programs to help reduce energy costs and build a better future.
data.text:
Need Help? Just Ask.

If you are facing financial hardships, we are here to help. Please call us at 520-623-7711 to discuss your options with a customer care agent or review our payment assistance page for ways we can support you.

Protect Yourself From Scams

Scammers want to steal your money. Year-round, TEP customers report suspicious phone calls, texts, letters and even visits from scammers who impersonate TEP employees. Learn more about how to protect yourself.

Keeping you in the know

TEP’s service has stayed affordable — all while maintaining reliability, meeting growth and transitioning to cleaner energy.

See how we performed in the J.D. Power 2023 Electric Utility Residential Customer Satisfaction Study.

TEP residential customers can expect to save this summer, thanks to several surcharge updates.

Help support reliable, affordable energy for our community

TEP is working to achieve net zero carbon emissions by 2050 while keeping energy affordable and reliable. But we need your help.

By working together and making small shifts in their energy usage, TEP can provide more reliable, sustainable electric service.

Sign up and earn a $50 Virtual Prepaid Mastercard®, and help us reduce energy use during times of high energy demand.

Helping you save energy and money

Want to save energy and lower your monthly bills? Join us for a walk through your home to help you identify more ways to save.

All our energy, all the time, just for you. Connect to programs, pricing plans and other options that fit your budget and your lifestyle.

Energy efficient products aren’t just smart for your wallet. They’re also good for the environment.
